<!--First Officer-->

:::{.callout-note collapse="false"}
## Founder
<table>
  <tr>
    <td style = "padding-right: 10pt">
      <img src = "../Images/Profiles/kris-photo.png" width = 200>
    </td>
    <td>
      <p style = "font-size:24px"><b>Kris Hao</b></p>
      <p>
        Kris is a Junior (pronouns she/hers) pursuing a Bachelors of Science in Data Science. She has coding experience in Python, RStudio, SQL, SAS Studio, and Git. Her main goal through co-founding the Statistics and Data Science Workshop Series is to bring together a group of talented and data-passionate students, no matter their technical-level, knowledge, or data-exposure, to work together and maximize their technical potential by learning and applying fundamental project concepts taught through the series.  
      </p>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
:::
